readable.title: 3432495898_a5859f06b6
readable.content: A brown dog laying on its back . A brown dog lies upside down on the cement road . A dog lies on his back on a road . A large dog is laying on its back , outside on a blacktop , with its legs in the air . A tan dog is rolling on his back on some asphalt with a bike and a scooter in the background .
